title: A Movie with Steve Jobs
description: A true story happened in July 2011, just months before Steve Jobs died. A woman's memoir, new version 17500 words, novelette.About seeing movies "Crazy, Stupid, Love" and more, with Steve Jobs and real-time streaming Mind-Reading interpreter.It's controversial, with critical biographical and new journalism approach, it revealed a secret and a question to investigate...A woman's memoir, new version 17500 words, novelette.
author: Lucia Powers
